p.i: For an overview of this resource and others in the Medication Definition domain, also see the module page

div.p: A medically related item or items of any type, in a container or package, representing the unit that has been prepared for sale, supply or similar use. These can include packaged medications, devices and other items such as food, biologicals, raw materials, medical fluids, gases etc. This resource represents the whole package of items, and all the packaging within, rather than the individual items themselves. In some cases a "product" exists at a logically higher level, which has a variety of available packages associated with it, typically of different sizes.
